CustomField.formula: IF( (ProductApprovalNeeded__c = TRUE && NOT(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c,"Approved"))) && ( NumOfProductsNeedingApproval__c > ApprovedProductsCount__c ), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.png","Yes:",20,20)+ " Preview Approvals After Saving", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png", "No:", 20, 20) + " No Approval Needed")
CustomField.label: Product Approval?
